channel.title: Noxere - PenTest Machine Writeups
channel.description: Recent content on Noxere - PenTest Machine Writeups

item.title: Bounty Hunter (HTB)
item.description: Enumeration To begin with, I run an Nmap scan: The initial scan shows 2 open ports - SSH on port 22 and Apache2 on port 80. I take a further look into port 80 through my browser. The webpage is for a team of bug bounty hunters. I run a gobuster directory scan in the background while continuing to explore the webpages. One interesting page I am able to navigate to is /log_submit.
